Notes

Limited deluxe edition of In Waves on 3 discs in a transparent outer sleeve. In Waves pressed on 2 discs alongside a 12” featuring two exclusive bonus tracks and the singles Let’s Do It Again, It’s So Good and Kill Dem. Runouts are etched, the plating marks (1=, 1V, 1-, 1Y) are mirrored.
